review: Ahh, Skyrim. My spare time waster and spare time consumer. This game is absolutely 100 percent perfect for any Steam Library.

I found it really fun, just running around the city.Graphics -  It's ok.Gameplay -  Fun enough, horrible P2W though. Guns/Shooting - ... ok. Over all - 6.5/10. Good F2P game, hat is what brought players, though.
10/10 FIrst COD game played.Only COD game played.
i cant play it cuz it says error: wrong game version deteced and i restart the launcher and nothing happens, plz help.

I absolutely recommend this game for anyone, whether you like FPS or not, this game is an abosolute delight to play hours on end with funny dialouge and to drive around killing Bandits as an overpowered, magic-wielding, explody bullet Siren or a crazy Psycopath with an axe and a whole lotta' bloody mess.
